title: Crime Alert 06.21.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.21.21
description:
Cops find nearly 200 pounds of cocaine in a car accident. Oregon pedophile gets huge sentence for conviction of 28 counts of abuse.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
